help-file.title: "DETECT ILLUSION"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Self Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Divination
This spell enables the caster to see invisible things and aids in the detection of illusion type spells possibly lowering the effect of some damage related illusion spells and aids in seeing through illusions such as Mask and Clone.
